comment: Lowkey rude and expects you to be passionate about ecology. I would rather retake orgo 3 times over than have a conversation with this man again. Makes you dig through bugs and dirt for no reason. prob worst lab I've taken. very condescending considering this is a required lab that no one wants to attend
has you digging around on a farm,  grades crazy bc he expects everyone to be into dirt and bugs to the extent he is. pick someone else bc you have to drive OFF CAMPUS for a 1 credit lab

He has in lecture notes that you have to fill in during lecture and I felt like I was more worried in filling in the notes than paying attention in class. A lot of material if you focus on the slides you'll do fine. Drops an exam out of 5. No final. Gives extra credit assignment at the end. he's very knowledgeable and passionate about this course.
